ISSUE.TITLE: CLI: list commands intermittently allow plural / singular names
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Works: - `awx hosts list -f human` - `awx inventory list -f human` Does not work: - `awx inventories list -f human` - `awx host list -f human` ##### EXPECTED RESULTS Either `hosts` / `inventories` or `host` / `inventory` ##### ACTUAL RESULTS Cannot predict syntax without looking things up

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4596 from ryanpetrello/fix-cli-required-args cli: fix a few bugs related to required OPTIONS Reviewed-by: https://github.com/apps/softwarefactory-project-zuul

COMMIT.MESSAGE: cli: fix an awx CLI alias typo see: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/4603
